channel.title: Where cani
channel.description: Find the item codes? like partyhats everything[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 10:32:39 PM[/size][hr]????

item.title: Where cani
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

[quote=“Play N Skillz, post:6, topic:77650”]if (command.startsWith("phats") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1044, 1); }

there’s command for p hats

Switch the player rights to whatever you want[/quote]

so bassically, even if you don’t have that first number you just do

::pickup 1042 1
::pickup 1040 1
::pickup 1046 1
::pickup 1038 1
::pickup 1044 1

you get the point

Read full topic

item.title: Where cani
item.dc:creator: @imsodank imsodank
item.description:
@imsodank wrote:

well heres the thing. i just want a few phats and i dont want to pick up money to buy or mooch of ppl so isthera a code where i can just say it and il have partyhats? or do i need to get 1 then spawn it? and how do i spawn items i already own?

Find the item codes? like partyhats everything[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 10:32:39 PM[/size][hr]???

Are you talking about finding the codes to make addItem commands, etc. ???
Or finding them in items.cfg to spawn an item or add it to a shop ???

item.title: Where cani
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

you can look in items.cfg

if you look there when theres a space such as in party hat use a underscore

e.g Party_hat, Halloween_mask , easter_egg

i hope i helped

item.title: Where cani
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Open up moparscape web client at www.moparisthebest.com… Wait for it to load, CLICK: (at the top)

Help —> Item ID’s , and type in what you’re looking for in the search box provided.
